class.name: ontology.classes.MeKnowledge
class.description: Represents agent knowledge of its physical abilities.

method.name: confine
method.description:
To confine a population located into a populated area.
This action can take time (depending on the current status of the population, e.g. if the population is alerted, the confinement is done more quickly).

argument.name: populatedArea
argument.description: The populated area in which the population should be confined.

return.name: confinement
return.description: True if the confinement is completed or if the populated area does not contain population to confine, false otherwise.

method.name: undoConfine
method.description: To lift the confinement of a population into the populated area.

argument.name: populatedArea
argument.description: The populated area in which the population is confined.

return.name: undoConfinement
return.description: True if the confinement is lifted or if the populated area does not contain confined population, false otherwise.

method.name: sendReport
method.description:
To send a decisional report corresponding to the given type.
Display a message.

argument.name: typeId
argument.description: The id of the report.

method.name: RC
method.description: Use by sendReport to display a given type of report.

argument.name: typeId
argument.description: The report type.

method.name: ensureVictimsEvacuation
method.description: To ensure evacuation of "victims" entity with the issued medical unit.

argument.name: victimsUnit
argument.description: The "victims" entity to ensure evacuation.

argument.name: medicalUnit
argument.description: The medical unit that take wounded elements into account.

return.description: Returns true if action of evacuation has started. False otherwise.

method.name: evacuate
method.description:
To evacuate the population located into the populated area.
This action can take time (depending on the current status of the population, e.g. if the population is alerted, the evacuation is done more quickly).

argument.name: populatedArea
argument.description: The populated area from which the population should be evacuted.

return.name: evacuation
return.description: True if the evacuation is completed or if the populated area does not contain population to evacuate, false otherwise.

method.name: undoEvacuate
method.description: To lift the evacuation of a population from a populated area.

argument.name: populatedArea
argument.description: The populated area from which the populated is evacuated.

return.name: evacuation
return.description: True if the evacuation is lifted or if the populated area does not contain evacuated population, false otherwise.

method.name: stopMovement
method.description: To call when the movement of the agent is stopped for a given target.

argument.name: destination
argument.description: The destination to stop moving to.

method.name: load
method.description: For this element (agent Unit) to load the given entity (A loaded entity is ready to be transported).

argument.name: entity
argument.description: The entity to load.

method.name: unload
method.description: For this element (agent Unit) to unload the given entity.

argument.name: entity
argument.description: The transported unit to unload.

method.name: decontaminate
method.description: An agent's physical ability to decontaminate a specified area.

argument.name: area
argument.description: The area to decontaminate.

method.name: alert
method.description: An agent's physical ability to alert a specified populated area.

argument.name: populatedArea
argument.description: The area whose population must be alerted.

return.description: Returns true upon simulation method completion, false otherwise.

method.name: damageResourceProductionCapability
method.description: To damage the resource node capability of production, with a specifed quantity.

argument.name: resourceNode
argument.description: The resource node to enact on.

argument.name: quantity
argument.description: The quantity of resource to remove from the node capability of production.

return.description: Returns true upon simulation method completion, false otherwise.

method.name: decreaseResourceProduction
method.description: To decrease the resource production of a production node, with a specified quantity.

argument.name: resourceNode
argument.description: The resource node to enact on.

argument.name: quantity
argument.description: The quantity of resource to remove from the production of the node.

return.description: Returns true upon simulation method completion, false otherwise.

method.name: disable
method.description: An agent's physical ability to deactivate a specified system.

argument.name: system
argument.description: The system to deactivate.

return.description: Returns true upon simulation method completion, false otherwise.

method.name: enable
method.description: An agent's physical ability to activate a specified system.

argument.name: system
argument.description: The system to activate.

return.description: Returns true upon simulation method completion, false otherwise.

method.name: enhanceResourceProductionCapability
method.description: To enhance the resource node capability of production, with a specifed quantity.

argument.name: resourceNode
argument.description: The resource node to act on.

argument.name: quantity
argument.description: The amount of additional resource to increase the node's production by.

return.description: Returns true upon simulation method completion, false otherwise.

method.name: extinguish
method.description: An agent's physical ability to extinguish a specified 'Fire' object.

argument.name: fire
argument.description: The fire to extinguish.

return.description: Returns true upon simulation method completion, false otherwise.

method.name: extractVictims
method.description: To extract wounded elements within the "victimsUnit".

argument.name: victimsUnit
argument.description: The "victimsUnit" to extract wounded elements from.

return.description: Returns true upon simulation method completion, false otherwise.

method.name: increaseResourceProduction
method.description: To increase the production of a resource node, with a specifed quantity.

argument.name: resourceNode
argument.description: The resource node to enact on.

argument.name: quantity
argument.description: The quantity of resource to add to the resource node.

return.description: Returns true upon simulation method completion, false otherwise.

method.name: loadCrowdConcentration
method.description: To load a given crowd concentration. Maximum elements of the cencontration are loaded, depending on agent Unit physical capabilities.

argument.name: crowd
argument.description: $$$ TODO

argument.name: destination
argument.description: $$$ TODO

method.name: unloadCrowdConcentration
method.description: To unload a given crowd concentration on a specific position (a 'Detination' object).

argument.name: crowd
argument.description: $$$ TODO

argument.name: destination
argument.description: $$$ TODO

method.name: canTransportCrowd
method.description: Check if this element can transport a Crowd. Returns true if agent Unit has physical capabilities to loasd a 'Crowd' object.

argument.name: crowd
argument.description: Returns true if this agent has the physical capacties to transport the given crowd.

method.name: undoAlert
method.description: An agent's physical ability to revert alert on a specified populated area.

argument.name: populatedArea
argument.description: The populated area whose populations must be un-alerted.

return.description: Returns true upon simulation method completion, false otherwise.

method.name: moveTo
method.description: Returns true upon simulation method completion, false otherwise.

argument.name: destination
argument.description: The destination to move to.

argument.name: urgency
argument.description: Whether the agent is in hurry or not. Affects the agent's pace.

argument.name: pathType
argument.description: The pat type used by subject Agent to reach the given destination.

return.description: Returns true upon simulation method completion, false otherwise.

method.name: equipWithNBCProtection
method.description: To take all necessary steps to get protected against NRBC agents.

return.description: Returns true once protection is complete.

method.name: create
method.description: An agent's physical ability to build a specified construction.

argument.name: work
argument.description: The construction to build.

return.name: builtWork
return.description: Returns the work built upon simulation method completion.
